useCase.name: Delete Task
useCase.trigger: User requests to delete a task

mainSequence.step: User sends a DELETE request to /api/tasks/{id}
TaskController calls TaskService to deleteTask with the provided task ID
TaskService calls TaskRepository to delete the task by ID
TaskService receives void response from TaskRepository
TaskService responds with void to TaskController
TaskController receives void response from TaskService
TaskController responds with void to User
